name: 232. When Sadness Rains
description: Sadness can pour down like a storm, flooding every part of you until you feel like you'll drown. But even when it rains, I know that somewhere, the sun is waiting to break through. When sadness rains, we must wait for the calm after the storm, knowing that brighter days are ahead.

attributes.value: blue, red, yellow, dark blue, white, black
